dublin_core.dcvalue: Panel Presentations Why are we afraid to talk about failure Debunking the taboo these panelists will present why certain digital health implementations didn t work and what they learned for implementing future programs Highlighted will be deployment of a SMS based ANC implementation in Nigeria and a behavior change communication pilot from the President s Malaria Initiative Africa Indoor Residual Spraying PMI AIRS Project in Mali Several key themes that will be explored will be addressing cultural practices and barriers when implementing a digital health solution as well as target audience acceptability and the importance of partnerships Presented by Ayomipo Edinger Program Coordinator for Digital Health Pathfinder
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-22T10:14:16Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 pathfinder_edingerayomipo_1.pdf: 588708 bytes, checksum: a7d3f6b5b1b25e4767832ba70c69c734 (MD5)
Learning from Failure: A Text2Speak Perspective
